folder: Forest Hill Road & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Forest Hill Road - Richmond Hill Road
text:
Forest Hill Road, south from Richmond Hill Road. This is a set of
two views taken the same day.
December 29, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.

folder: Forest Hill Road & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY

folder: Forest Hill Road & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY

text:
Forest Hill Road, north from Richmond Hill Road.
December 27, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road
text:
(1)
Richmond Hill Road, south side, 400 feet west
of Forest Hill Road. This property belonged to Weigel (1898-1907), and to Ludwig Brown (1917). The view is eastward
toward Forest Hill Road.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the homestead and farmland,
at a later date.
May 18, 1937
P. L. Sperr
(3)
The homestead as viewed in a westerly direction
from Forest Hill Road.
May 18, 1937
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road
text:
Water-Supply--Wells: A well with chain hoist on the south side of Richmond Hill Road, west of Forest Hill Road,
Staten Island.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr

folder: Forest Hill Road & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Forest Hill Road - Richmond Hill Road
text:
Forest Hill Road, at the S.W. corner of Richmond
Hill Road.
June 16,l935
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road
text:
Richmond Hill Road, west from a point about 300 yards
west of Forest Hill Road.
May 22, 1936
P. L. Sperr

folder: Forest Road & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Forest Road - Richmond Hill Road
text:
Forest Road, west from Richmond Road. This was formerly the George Cromwell property.
May o, 1926
y
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road
text:
Richmomd Hill Road, south side, 430 yards west of Forest Hill Road. The house was owned by J. T. Decker in 1874 (Seers's map), and by Sylvanus Decker from 1898
to 1917 (Robinson and Bromley maps).
May 22, 1936
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road
text:
Richmond Hill Road, east from a point 500 yards west of Forest Hill Road, toward the latter. The first house on the right is on the Sylvanus Decker property; the white house and barn beyond that is that of Ludwig Brown; and the dwelling on the left is another Sylvanus Decker
house (1917 map).
May 18, 1937
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road
text:
Richmond Hill Road, south side, about 600 yards west of Forest Hill Road. This house has been in the hands of the
De Puy family since 1874 (187eA1917 maps).
June 13, 1927
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road
text:
Richmond Hill Road, south side, about 700 yards
west of Forest Hill Road. The house was owned by H. Decker in 1874; Mrs. W. Jones from 1898 to 1907; and Annie Sender in 1917.
May 6, 1929
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Forest Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Forest Hill Road
text:
(V)
Richmond Hill Road, north side, 700 feet west of Forest Hill Road, showing the Sylvanus Decker house and barns
(1874-1917 maps). The view is eastward.
May 22, 1936
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, a year later.
May 18, 1937
L. Sperr
